name: WealthWise Elite Library
description: Institutional-grade financial intelligence for building generational wealth

books.title: The Wealth Transfer Code
books.author: Marcus Rothschild III
books.description: How the ultra-rich move billions without paying taxes
books.longDescription: CONFIDENTIAL WEALTH STRATEGIES! Discover how the ultra-wealthy transfer billions in assets while paying minimal taxes. Learn the same legal structures used by billionaire families for generations. This exclusive guide reveals offshore trusts, family limited partnerships, and advanced estate planning techniques that preserve wealth across multiple generations.

books.title: Market Psychology Decoded
books.author: Dr. Alexandra Sterling
books.description: The behavioral patterns that drive trillion-dollar market moves
books.longDescription: INSTITUTIONAL INTELLIGENCE! Master the psychological patterns that move billions in global markets. Learn to read market sentiment like a Wall Street veteran. This groundbreaking research reveals the cognitive biases that create market inefficiencies and how institutional traders exploit them for massive profits.

books.title: Offshore Wealth Structures
books.author: Jonathan Cayman, CPA
books.description: Legal frameworks for international wealth preservation
books.longDescription: ELITE FINANCIAL ENGINEERING! Learn the sophisticated offshore structures used by ultra-high-net-worth families to protect and grow wealth internationally. Discover legal methods to minimize global tax liability while maintaining full control of your assets.

books.title: Private Equity Mastery
books.author: Harrison Blackstone
books.description: Inside strategies from top-tier PE firms
books.longDescription: WALL STREET SECRETS! Access the investment methodologies used by the world's most successful private equity firms. Learn how to identify, structure, and execute deals that generate 20%+ IRR consistently.

books.title: The Crypto Wealth Blueprint
books.author: Satoshi Williams
books.longDescription: DIGITAL ASSET MASTERY! Discover how institutional investors are building massive wealth through cryptocurrency. Learn advanced DeFi strategies, yield farming techniques, and portfolio construction methods used by crypto hedge funds.

books.title: Real Estate Empire
books.author: Victoria Sterling
books.description: Commercial real estate strategies of billionaire developers
books.longDescription: REAL ESTATE MASTERY! Learn the sophisticated commercial real estate strategies used by billionaire developers to build massive property empires. Discover advanced financing techniques, value-add strategies, and market timing methods.

collections.name: Elite Wealth Mastery
collections.title: Complete Billionaire Blueprint
collections.description: Everything you need to build generational wealth like the ultra-rich
collections.bonus: EXCLUSIVE: Private Family Office Playbook + 1-on-1 Wealth Strategy Session

collections.title: Professional Investment Strategies
collections.description: Advanced investment techniques from Wall Street professionals
